Package ohos.data.dataability

Class DataAbilityUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.dataability.DataAbilityUtils

  • public class DataAbilityUtils
extends Object
    A utility class that provides static methods for database operations.

    This class provides interfaces to create OrmPredicates and RdbPredicates objects from the DataAbilityPredicates object.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_APPDATAMGR

    • Method Detail

      • createRdbPredicates

        public static RdbPredicates createRdbPredicates​(DataAbilityPredicates dataAbilityPredicates,
                                                String tableName)
        Creates an RdbPredicates object from a DataAbilityPredicates object.

        The RdbPredicates object can be used to perform database operations.

        Parameters:
        dataAbilityPredicates - Indicates the DataAbilityPredicates object used to create the RdbPredicates object.
        tableName - Indicates the table name.
        Returns:
        Returns the RdbPredicates object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if tableName is null or the RdbPredicates object cannot be created from the DataAbilityPredicates object.
        Since:
        1

      • createOrmPredicates

        public static <T extends OrmObject> OrmPredicates createOrmPredicates​(DataAbilityPredicates dataAbilityPredicates,
                                                                      Class<T> klass)
        Creates an OrmPredicates object from a DataAbilityPredicates object.

        The OrmPredicates object can be used to perform database operations.

        Parameters:
        dataAbilityPredicates - Indicates the DataAbilityPredicates object used to create the OrmPredicates object.
        klass - Indicates the class.
        Returns:
        Returns the OrmPredicates object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if klass is null or the OrmPredicates object cannot be created from the DataAbilityPredicates object.
        Since:
        1
